After confirming the TV is on, you can set the desired channel using the `tvChannel` capability. If one TV fails to respond, you can try the other one. Further disambiguation may be needed if the user specifies which channel to set. 

<FINISHED>
intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects to move the current channel from the Samsung 8 Series TV to the Samsung The Frame TV, turn off the Samsung 8 Series TV, and ensure that the Samsung The Frame TV is set to the same channel as the Samsung 8 Series TV, which is currently set to channel 7.  
Constraints & cues: The user is operating two Samsung TVs, specifically the Samsung The Frame (49 inches) and the Samsung 8 Series (82 inches). The Samsung 8 Series TV is currently on channel 7 and needs to be turned off after transferring the channel to the Samsung The Frame TV.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding whether the user wants to set the Samsung The Frame TV to channel 7 or if they want to move a different channel. If the current channel on the Samsung 8 Series is not confirmed, the action may not meet the user's expectations.
